languages.text: "Уважаемый кормчий хотел заметить, что эти несчастные годятся разве что для черной работы. Квалифицированных пустотников — в нужных нам количествах — отыскать там попросту невозможно".

traits.locale_text: "Уважаемый кормчий хотел заметить, что эти несчастные годятся разве что для черной работы. Квалифицированных матросов — в нужных нам количествах — отыскать почти невозможно".

languages.text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."
languages.original_text: "Уважаемый кормчий хотел заметить, что эти несчастные годятся разве что для черной работы. Квалифицированных пустотников — в нужных нам количествах — отыскать там попросту невозможно".

traits.locale_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidfarers in the numbers we require."
"What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidfarers in the numbers we require."
"What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidfarers in the numbers we require."
"What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."
"What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

languages.text: 「私たちが尊敬すべきマスター・ヘルムスマンが言おうとしたのは、あのような不運な者たちは単純労働にしか向いていないということです。私たちが必要としている人数の資格のあるヴォイズマンを見つけるのは、現実的に不可能なのです」
languages.original_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちが尊敬すべきマスター・ヘルムスマンが言おうとしたのは、あのような不運な者たちは単純労働にしか向いていないということです。私たちが必要としている人数の資格のあるヴォイズマンを見つけるのは、現実的に不可能なのです」

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Başserdümen'in demek istediği şey, bu talihsiz kimselerin yalnızca angarya işlere uygun olduğu. İhtiyaç duyduğumuz sayıda kalifiye uçsuz eri bulmak imkânsız."
languages.original_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer Başserdümen'in demek istediği şey, bu talihsiz kimselerin yalnızca angarya işler için uygun olduğudur. Bizim ihtiyaç duyduğumuz sayıda kalifiye uçsuz eri bulmak imkânsız."

languages.text: «Lo que el estimado maestro timonel quiere decir es que esos desdichados solo son aptos para tareas menores. En resumidas cuentas, es imposible encontrar infantes del vacío cualificados en las cantidades que necesitamos».
languages.original_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que el estimado maestro timonel quiere decir es que esos desdichados solo son aptos para tareas menores. En resumidas cuentas, es imposible encontrar infantes del vacío cualificados en las cantidades que necesitamos».

languages.text: “我们尊敬的舵手长的意思是，那些令人遗憾的劳工只适合做体力劳动，他们之中根本没有我们需要的合格船员。”
languages.original_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

traits.locale_text: “我们尊敬的舵手长的意思是，那些令人遗憾的劳工只适合做体力劳动，他们之中根本没有我们需要的合格船员。”

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de répondre pour notre très estimé maître timonier. Je pense qu'il voulait dire que ces malheureux ne sont qualifiés que pour les plus basses besognes. Il serait impossible d'y recruter un nombre suffisant de cosmomarins. »
languages.original_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de répondre pour notre très estimé maître timonier. Je pense qu'il voulait dire que ces malheureux ne sont qualifiés que pour les plus basses besognes. Il serait impossible d'y recruter un nombre suffisant de cosmomarins. »

languages.text: "Was unser geschätzter Hauptsteuermann damit sagen will ist, dass diese armen Seelen nur für niedere Arbeiten geeignet sind. Es ist schier unmöglich, qualifizierte Raumfahrer in der erforderlichen Menge zu finden."
languages.original_text: "What our esteemed Master Helmsman meant to say is that those unfortunates are only suitable for menial labour. It is simply impossible to find qualified voidsmen in the numbers we require."

traits.locale_text: "Was unser geschätzter Hauptsteuermann damit sagen will ist, dass diese armen Seelen nur für niedere Arbeiten geeignet sind. Es ist schier unmöglich, qualifizierte Raumfahrer in der erforderlichen Menge zu finden."
